DOC.criteria: Age 18 55 year Chronic pelvic pain diagnosis , define persistent pain pelvis related structure Pain duration ≥6 month Average pain intensity ≥3/10 NRS previous week To understand objective study Suspicion knowledge current organic pathology require medical surgical treatment Pain consequence surgery know Pending litigation financial compensation Psychiatric disorder : major depression , bipolar syndrome , etc ..
